A master scroll book is an item obtainable from any level Treasure Trail except beginner. If a reward casket would reward any type of teleport scroll, there is a 1/23 chance for it to reward a master scroll book instead.[1]

The master scroll book can store up to 1000 of every type of teleport scroll, which is done by "using" the scroll with the book. The player can open their book to show an interface where they can select any of the teleport scrolls stored in it to use or take scrolls out of the book. They can also set one of the scrolls in it as the default teleport option, which becomes the left-click option of the book.

Players can exchange an empty master scroll book with Watson to receive 10-20 Watson teleport scrolls. This currently results in a profit of between −104,759 and 111,031 coins per master scroll book exchanged, with an average profit of 3,136 coins.

The master scroll book interface. Here, the Lunar Isle teleport is selected as the default left-click teleport on the book.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 April 2019
(update | poll)

Empty master scroll books can now be exchanged with Watson to receive 10-20 teleport scrolls to his house.

20 July 2017
(update)

Empty master scroll books can now be traded on the Grand Exchange.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 30 September 2018. (Archived from the original on 30 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "If it's going to give you a teleport scroll, it has a 1/23 chance of giving the book instead."

A '''master scroll book''' is an item obtainable from any level [[Treasure Trails|Treasure Trail]] except beginner. If a [[reward casket]] would reward any type of [[teleport scroll]], there is a 1/23 chance for it to reward a master scroll book instead.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1046425194980667392|date=30 September 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/OLL39|archivedate=30 May 2020|quote=If it's going to give you a teleport scroll, it has a 1/23 chance of giving the book instead.}}

The master scroll book can store up to 1000 of every type of teleport scroll, which is done by "using" the scroll with the book. The player can open their book to show an interface where they can select any of the teleport scrolls stored in it to use or take scrolls out of the book. They can also set one of the scrolls in it as the default teleport option, which becomes the left-click option of the book.

Players can exchange an empty master scroll book with [[Watson]] to receive 10-20 [[Watson teleport|Watson teleport scrolls]]. This currently results in a profit of between {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Watson teleport|10}}-{{GEP|Master scroll book (empty)}}}} and {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Watson teleport|20}}-{{GEP|Master scroll book (empty)}}|c}} per master scroll book exchanged, with an average profit of {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Watson teleport|15}}-{{GEP|Master scroll book (empty)}}|c}}.

[[File:Master scroll book interface.png|left|thumb|300px|The master scroll book interface. Here, the Lunar Isle teleport is selected as the default left-click teleport on the book.]]
